pullrequest.title: Smaller green buttons, and make theme default

content.raw: I think you're partly right. It works with a fresh copy of BLACS (there is no code in the latest version that sets it to an empty string), but it will not work for people who currently have an empty string saved as that will be judged to be a non-default custom stylesheet. I'll take it into accuont.
content.html: I think you're partly right. It works with a fresh copy of BLACS (there is no code in the latest version that sets it to an empty string), but it will not work for people who currently have an empty string saved as that will be judged to be a non-default custom stylesheet. I'll take it into accuont.
